hero.title: Where Art Meets Rubber
hero.subtitle: Crafting bespoke keychains and patches that tell your story.

about.title: About Elastic Canvas
about.paragraph1: Founded on the principle of tangible creativity, Elastic Canvas transforms your ideas into durable, high-quality rubber art. We are a team of designers and artisans dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible with custom keychains and patches.
about.paragraph2: Our process is a fusion of modern technology and traditional craftsmanship, ensuring every piece is not just a product, but a personal statement.

craft.title: Our Craft
craft.subtitle: From Concept to Creation
craft.step1_desc: We work closely with you to translate your vision into a production-ready design.
craft.step2_desc: Using state-of-the-art technology, we create precise molds that capture every detail.
craft.step3_desc: We inject vibrant, durable PVC rubber, bringing your design to life layer by layer.
craft.step4_desc: Each piece is meticulously inspected to meet our high standards of quality and durability.
